titleStmt.title: The intended treason, of Doctor Parrie: and his complices, against the Queenes moste excellent Maiestie With a letter sent from the Pope to the same effect.
titleStmt.author: Stubbes, Phillip.
Gregory XIII, Pope, 1502-1585.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Henry Car, and are to be solde in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Blazing Starre,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Phillip Stubbes Gentleman.
The letter, written for Pope Gregory XIII, is signed: Rome the 30. of Ianuary, 1584. .. N. Cardinall of Como.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Blazing Starre
